subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic won his second Australian Open title by defeating Andy Murray, his boyhood friend, 6-4, 6-2, 6-3, on Sunday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic won his second Australian Open title by defeating Andy Murray, his boyhood friend, 6-4, 6-2, 6-3, on Sunday.
